## DATA CLEANING

```{r Setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
alc <- read.csv("sh_alc_pcap_li.csv")
alc <- alc |> 
  rename_with(.fn = ~str_sub(.x,2), 
                          .cols = X1999:X2017)
alc <- alc |> 
  mutate(
    across("1999":"2017", as.numeric))
alc |> head()
```
```{r}
#Pivoting Longer
alc_final <- alc |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = `1999`:`2017`,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "alcohol_consumption")
```
